description: Try our easy to follow Thai-Style Salad with Chicken & Grapefruit recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Thai-Style Salad with Chicken & Grapefruit Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 extra large country style roasted chicken, shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Remove meat from chicken, discarding skin and bones. Shred meat and place into a large bowl.
Peel grapefruit, removing as much white pith as possible. Divide into segments by cutting close to the dividing membranes that surround each segment.
Add to chicken with chilli, mint, coriander, carrot and onion.
Combine sugar, fish sauce, lime juice and 2 tablespoons water in small bowl and stir well to dissolve sugar.
Pour dressing over chicken mixture and toss gently to combine.
Divide chicken mixture among serving plates.
Sprinkle with peanuts and fried shallot to serve.
